name: Oops! All Gyarus!
description:
One year after opening Barlow's Books and Bistro, the gang decide to celebrate with a custom concoction of tea and sparkly, glamorous liqueur. Surely, nothing could possibly go wrong. In fact, with Maggie and Portia finally existing in the same timeline, how could things go any way other than totes fab?

The fans have spoken, and we've heard you loud and clear: Mice Tea simply did not contain enough gyarus. This very special April Fools scenario aims to correct that mistake. Jam packed with as much gyaru goodness as we could muster, with guest illustrations from Popcore, blackshirtboy, NotZachForWork, CupcakeCarly, ComicTF, Ayvie, and Cavitees, and guest audio by Raina the Mouse, there's a lot to enjoy.

name: Ark: Scorched Earth Ascended
description: Stranded naked, parched and starving in a vast desert, even seasoned ARK survivors must use all their skills to stand a chance of survival. Tame, breed, and ride the desert's mysterious new creatures including... DRAGONS!

name: Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising - Premium Avatar Set: Shadowverse
description: Set Contents: • Premium Avatars: Arisa, Luna, Rowen • Badges: Arisa, Luna, Rowen • Weapon Cutouts: Forest Guardian's Bow, Dragonslayer Spear

name: The Legend of Azarias Rebirth
description: Embark on a thrilling journey as the Angel Raphael in this action packed 3D first-person dungeon crawler. Conquer 24 unique floors, battle menacing demons, and undertake challenging side quests to amass power to save the girl Sarah.

name: Peerless Destiny
description: "Peerless Destiny" is a fantasy 3DARPG, with exaggerated and cool fight, rich plots, and full dubbing of all game characters and creatures!

name: Love Is All Around: Love In The Room
description: "Xiamen, I'm here!" You will play as the male protagonist Gu Yi and immerse yourself in a unique shared living life with three beautiful roommates in Xiamen from a first person perspective.Who you would choose at the end, is up to you to decide.

name: Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker - Special Ninjutsu: Wood Style - Wood Golem Jutsu
description: This Special Ninjutsu DLC unlocks new Ninjutsu for your original ninja. Summon a giant wood golem, just like the First Hokage did, and destroy your enemies!

name: Echoed Realms
description: Echoed Realms is a Casual Stylized Fantasy RPG focused on player experience and dynamic gameplay. Play it your way, even if that changes every day.

name: Hazelwood Station
description: Guide Clay on a narrative adventure to Hazelwood station, exploring everything you can along the way and making just enough money to buy your next train ticket.

name: I'm Not Sleepy
description: In this fast-paced arena roguelike, you're a clown, a baker, a robot, a ballerina... or maybe you're just asleep! Battle hordes of bizarre baddies, collect curious items, and select powerful upgrades to enhance the unique abilities of your growing roster of playable characters.

name: Shijie Xiuxian
description: A real-time strategy fairy cultivation game, SHIJIE XIUXIAN. 18 combinations. Hundreds of skills. Endless Weapon Enhancement. You can play endless levels after breaking through the levels

name: Clock Rogue
description: Clock Rogue is a rogue-like game that challenges you to count without the time displayed to activate the attack. Build your own time clock and protect the hedgehog from viruses attack!

name: Railroad Scheduler
description: A train adventure where you avoid collisions and complete each level in the fastest time possible. With the ability to control time, you'll have the power to determine the game's speed and even go back in time to fix any mistakes and optimize the travel time for every train.

name: Mortal Hire
description: Explore new planets and civilizations. Turn in precious artifacts to the management company and get rich financially!

name: Can't Stand The Heat
description: Congratulations, you own a restaurant! Now just chat with customers, take orders, cook, serve, clean, design your interior and menu, order ingredients...so much to do! Earn enough cash and hire some help to make life easier. Or is it? Try to balance customer needs, employee quirks and your cashflow.

name: Cinnabunny
description: Cinnabunny is a cozy life simulator game where you play as a bunny who runs a bakery. Unlock new recipes, go birdwatching, collect mushrooms, and charm your community. Save up enough carrots to help your family move.

name: LowPoly Towerdefense
description: You play in a SciFi environment with LowPoly graphics, engaging in Tower Defense. Manage resources! Each round introduces more enemies that you must defeat. Build resource ships in the factory and simultaneously construct towers on the platforms to fend off the adversaries.

name: Steve: Operation Nuts
description: A strange portal appears and attracted Steve and all his beloved bolts inside, scattering them all over the universe! Embark on a colorful adventure with Steve to help him find his artifacts.

name: Brown Trouble
description: Brown Trouble - a 2D classic puzzle game. Control with the left mouse button, click on the pieces of pipes, turning them in the desired direction. Once you can adjust one of the pipes correctly, everything will be fine until the pipe becomes clogged again, only make the situation worse.

name: Arena Constellation
description: Fast Paced 3rd Person Skill Based Competitive Multiplayer Game. Arena constellation is bringing back what old competitive games have the best: The gameplay.

name: Legend of Stars
description: Balance ball run our shooting game, including a variety of bullets, magic, characters can be upgraded, clear version of the clearance mode

name: Erwartung
description: Immerse yourself in a nocturnal, eerie forest in the virtual reality production of Arnold Schönberg's "Erwartung". The anxiety of a woman who wanders through the forest in search of her lover becomes an intense performance experience through the expressive sound.

name: Super Monsters
description: Are you ready to join the monsters gang and take on the ultimate challenge in Super Monsters Gang Double jump? Join Bob and others and start jumping, dashing, and dodging your way through a monster invasion like never before!

name: Steel Manticore
description: Steel Manticore is a 3D FPS. In the Saraif Republic, the government is on the verge of collapse. Play as a Republican Guard robot pilot to prevent an anti-government uprising. Use main guns, machine guns, rockets, missiles and grenades to defeat your enemies.

name: Saving Clicklandia
description: The Legendary Dragon has attacked, unleashing terror and disorder upon the once-tranquil realm. The fate of the kingdom and its people hangs in the balance, and only a true hero can stand against the impending disaster.

name: CrabbleUp
description: Dive into an oceanic odyssey, where serene exploration meets thrilling challenges. Embark on a journey through endless underwater mazes, armed only with your cunning and defending yourself from perilous foes with the power of your bubbles.

name: Pyramids and Aliens: Escape Room
description: Embark on an archeological adventure inside an ancient pyramid to find your missing mentor. As an intrepid explorer, solve puzzles, investigate clues, and unravel the pyramid's secrets. Spoiler: it was not built by humans!

name: Party Club
description: Party Club is a multiplayer adventure that lets you manage a lively venue with up to 4 friends. Whether it's tossing orders to patrons or cleaning up after a busy day, Party Club promises endless fun and hilarious moments with your fellow pals!

name: Chaos Journey
description: It is a survival and action game set in a post-apocalyptic world. This robot, which was sent from Mars to Earth to prevent the destruction of Earth after the zombie invasion, tries to save living people by fighting hordes of zombies and produce cures to save the world.

name: Metroid Fool
description:
[Dedicated to each and every person who has ever taken this game a bit too seriously]

Re-discover Tallon IV now that most of it's rooms have been filled with perplexing puzzles, jovial japes and even a few sacrilegious stinkers. Do you have what it takes to endure them all?

name: Super Falling Fred
description: Join Fred's latest and most vertical adventure yet, from high in the sky to the fiery depths of the earth. Upgrade your character's abilities, discover awesome power-ups, and crush a new set of annoying characters.

name: Moon Rider
description:
Moon Rider is a side project developed by two people over a few months to be a learning resource for open A-Frame and WebXR developers. It's a free and open source music visualization and rhythm game website powered by the community Beat Saver public dataset.

Surf your way through tens of thousands of songs created by the community in Punch Mode, Ride Mode, Classic Mode. Get a workout and try to make your way up the leaderboards. New improvements and features released frequently!

name: Bounced
description: Unreleased Game Boy Color game from Karma Studios. A fully completed version of the game was found in 2020 among a collection of leaked Nintendo approved roms.

name: Austin Powers: Why Make Millions...?
description:
Austin Powers: Why Make Millions...? is an unreleased game for the Game Boy Color that was meant to be the fourth game in the series of Austin Powers for the system. Like the other games in the series, it was intended to be a mini game collection.

The prototype for the game was discovered in the September 2020 batch of the Nintendo gigaleaks.

name: Castelian
description: Sin descripción

name: Carrera
description: A cancelled slot car racing game featuring the titular brand.

name: Grand Casino
description: Grand Casino is a gambling game that was shown (alongside Altron's Billiard Club) at Spaceworld 2000 with a release planned for that October, only to be scrapped. It eventually surfaced as part of the September 2020 Game Boy lotcheck leaks.

name: John Madden Football
description: John Madden Football is a port of John Madden Football '93 announced by Ubisoft in 1993 for both NES and Game Boy, but never released.

name: John Madden Football
description: Sin descripción

name: Jibaku-kun: Zero no Ki no Kajitsu
description: Self-Destructie: Fruit of the Zero Tree is a scrapped action-RPG based on the Jibaku-Kun manga/anime by Ami Shibata.

name: Rap Quest
description: Rap Quest started life as Rap City, a game starring the one and only Vanilla Ice, who was later on replaced with "Cool Q" due to his waning popularity. The game was finished and sent in to Nintendo for approval, but was never released.

name: Nick Faldo Championship Golf
description: Sin descripción

name: Momoiro Zousan
description: Momoiro Zousan, or Johnson and Friends, is an unreleased 1994 game based on an Australian children's show of the same name.

name: Mission Bravo
description: Sin descripción

name: Wily & Right no Rock Board: That's Paradise
description: Sin descripción

name: Hit the Ice
description: Instead of being a straight port, the NES Hit the Ice is a unique mix of sports and RPG (complete with leveling up and random encounters!).

name: Puzznic
description: Sin descripción

name: Speedball 2: Brutal Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: The Lawnmower Man

name: Maou ga Ochiru Hi
description:
The final boss "Demon King" comes to defeat the main character on the promised day!
With only one year left, you must develop your hero through training and adventure, assemble the strongest party from 15 friends with strong personalities, and intercept the approaching Demon Lord!

If you go as far as you can, you can get to the ending in 5 minutes from the start, it's a
super easy RPG!

Whew! To be blunt, that's a very extreme example.

Although it is a popular genre most loved by Japan, it has evolved (?) to extend the play time. I can't do it anymore! This work, "The Day the Demon King Falls," is the antithesis of an RPG that has come to the level of RPG, or rather, it is a counter-evolutionary form that has come to the answer.

The time to play one time until the ending is about 1~2 hours, even for those who are frequent adventurers. A person who doesn't venture at all and is a recluse... Well, the shortest is about 5 minutes (laughs).

There is also the peculiarity of this game that the final boss goes out of his way to defeat the main character, so the time to play one time is extremely short, but instead you can easily play it as many times as you want. It is a game that can be played for a long time, saying that there is a new discovery every time you play.

By all means, I would like you to clear this about 40 ~ 50 times (laughs).

RPGs have evolved in a way that is quite biased (?) in response to general needs such as "volume" and "can be played for a long time". How about a game like this?

Some of the characters are also irresistibly attractive! (laughs)

name: Yu Sha Rong Shen Jin
description: What kind of product is it? It is a simple tower defense game with text plot, visual interaction of novels, and the nature of love cultivation.

name: Victory Away: Three Kingdoms
description: Victory Away：Three Kingdoms is a traditional battle chess game where you will play the role of Liu Bei and embark on the journey of reviving the Han dynasty.

name: Kaiwa 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Project of Cooling the Earth
description: Players must survive in the ruins of the human world and face various survival challenges and dangers. Players need to search for resources in abandoned cities and wilderness, including food, water sources, construction materials, etc., to maintain survival and build safe shelters.

name: Hoshikage no Yakata Satsujin Jiken
description: Sin descripción

name: Easy Jigsaw Puzzle
description: A puzzle game that combines traditional puzzles with a few less serious ones.

name: Blu Caligo
description: Step into the shoes of a nameless exile left to die on a Mediterranean island in this first-person horror adventure. Explore an open world of haunting beauty, craft your weapons, and confront threats emerging from the depths of the island at dusk.

name: Survive The Night
description: Explore a vast world filled with hidden treasures and mysterious creatures, all while crafting powerful tools, weapons, and armor to build your fortress. Battle relentless foes, customize your character, and become the ultimate survival master. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Escape From The Island
description: This is a super fun game.

name: StarFlow
description: Lead the story of Nella, a little witch and apprentice to the witch of the western forest. Learn various skills and magic, and interact with people through activities like farming and fishing!

name: Die Last
description: We must revive this post-industrial world. Plant trees to earn Karma, build pipes, join Guilds, and participate in league tournaments to stay alive. Find lost objects to craft secret messages. Go rogue, wander with your dog, steal other players' Karma and grow stronger with every battle

name: Astra Nova
description: Astra Nova is a RPG set in a universe on the brink of destruction, offering players a blend of immersive storytelling, strategic gameplay, and next-gen rewards.

name: Waki & The Lost Spirits
description: Waki & the Lost Spirits is a 2D action platformer with some tastes of a metroidvania game. In this game you will explore the forest, fight enemies, solve puzzles, complete challenges, beat some bosses in order to save the lost spirits of the forest.

name: Last Supper Of Devils
description: Last Supper of Devil is a collaborative horror game that can be played by at least 4 and up to 8 players. Players will role a Devil and attempting to reincarnate into humans through sacrificial rituals, or role a Devotee and infiltrate Devils to fight against them.

name: Hidden Object Secrets: The Whitefield Murder - Collector's Edition
description: Step into the shoes of a detective tasked with solving the enigmatic murder of a man whose past is shrouded in mystery! Can you solve another complicated case?

name: Greenhouse
description: Greenhouse is a gloomy and atmospheric erotic interactive fiction with an aura of mystery. You'll play as Erik, a male scalie dragon, as you navigate the sexual perils of the greenhouse.

name: The Magus Circle
description: The Magus Circle is a survival roguelite where you are the spellcaster. Draw arcane sigils and combine powerful upgrades to dominate the endless tide of monstrosities. Join forces with mages from across the universe and uncover the secrets of these mana-hungry monsters and the Magus Circle.

name: Night Castle
description: Night Castle is a 2D Metroidvania game with a retro art concept. Explore an old castle inhabited by demons and ghosts and purify the darkness with light!

name: Cyber Chaos
description: play as a pew pew punk soldier and clear rooms to progress to more difficult stages.

name: Invasion Rush
description: An apocalyptic disaster has left the door open for all kind of creatures to invade our home! Jump right into action in this hero-top down shooter-coop-roguelite experience, power up your survivors, defeat bosses and try to see how far you can get!

name: Mausoleum of Memories
description: Mausoleum of Memories is a first-person 3D puzzle adventure game based on Egyptian Mythology. You play as the ghost of a man named Aaru who has been denied entrance to the afterlife and now must reflect on his human existence and any lessons he may have learned so he can finally rest in peace.

name: Vultures
description: Vultures is a manufacturing simulation game with a capitalist twist. Build an industrial empire, play the stock market for quick loot, and flood an ever-changing economy with cheap junk to buy, bribe, or bankrupt your way to the highest perch.

name: Pieced Together
description: Pieced Together is a cozy scrapbooking game that takes you on a heartfelt journey about friendship, getting older and learning to let go.

name: Nexus Wars
description: Embark on early Nexus Wars, an enthralling auto-battler set: 4970 years in the future, before the galactic calamity. Command a mech army across 9 factions with 180+ units: customizable gear and skills. Master strategic gameplay and PvP battles, laying the groundwork for an expansive PvE storyline.

name: Doupleri
description: A chill game about destroying blocks with symbols.

name: Circulation
description: Manipulate strange machines and use their mechanics to rotate the platforms around you. Create pathways by manipulating and aligning platforms. Solve the puzzles that surround you, uncover hidden paths, and strive to escape the challenging maze.

name: Lass ich Sliden
description: Lass ich Sliden is a Open world Game. Embark on an extraordinary journey into the boundless realm of Lass ich sliden, an open-world game that promises to redefine the genre. Prepare to immerse yourself in an expansive universe, brimming with endless possibilities, exhilarating quests,

name: Nathan Morgan: Dilemma
description: Nathan Morgan: Dilemma is a single-player detective game. Detective Nathan Morgan, stationed in the state, is assigned to follow the trail of the mysterious murder at the Bennett mansion. Our goal is to find the killer by making use of the clues.

name: Event Horizon
description: Event Horizon is an action-adventure sci-fi shooter with the heart of souls-like utilizing gun modification and first-person scanning to explore the unknown depths of the cosmos.

name: Erentis, l'académie de magie
description: Un MMORPG 2D free-to-play dans un univers de fantasy avec des combats en tour par tour, des professions avec un gameplay uniques, des dialogues avec choix de réponses et bien d'autres fonctionnalités !

name: Paranormal Flipper
description: House renovation game but houses are haunted! Find cheap houses, buy, renovate, clean and sell them with a good profit. Spend your money for better equipment and bigger houses. But you need to stay sane, because most of houses are full of dangers and creepy creatures.

name: Dice Guess
description: A minimalistic logic game where you predict the number the dice will display face up after a roll. Discover tricks and strategies to eliminate luck from the equation and ascend to become the ultimate dicempion.

name: Darkwell: Assassin's Choice
description: 《DARKWELL:Assassin's Choice》 is a fast-paced, one-hit kill style top-down combat game that uses various methods such as hook, deflect, dash, and skills to end enemies, and finally choose your Assassin's Road in this experience

name: Millie Megavolte 8: Millie and the Mole King
description: Flash may be dead but Millie's back in this action-packed revival! The Mole King is gearing up for war and made the mistake of annoying Millie. Go berserk and massacre your way through mountains of monsters to shut him up for good.

name: Kinny and the Lost Starlight
description: Kinny and the Lost Starlight is a roguelike deck-building game inspired by tic-tac-toe, where your goal is to light up the cosmos by calling stars to the board and defeating your enemies.

name: Path of Ninja
description: A platform game with a Ninja theme where the player needs collect the Shuricoins and finish by getting the Phantom Blade. At each level the player will have a rank.

name: Shadows of Destruction
description: Deep in the Land of Honshu where ancient traditions and dark secrets converge. In this side-scrolling adventure, you'll wields the swords of Ryota, a betrayed samurai, and his enigmatic savior, Diago. Together, they are the "Shadows of Destruction," a force forged in revenge and shrouded in mystery.

name: What Lurks Inside
description: Immerse in a 4-player game of deceit and survival where anyone could turn into a monstrous threat. Survivors must escape a dynamic facility, completing missions for a higher score, while the creature blends in, sabotaging their efforts. Trust is your biggest challenge

name: Card Toons
description: Battle against toons in this cartoony roguelike deckbuilder where each run is different. Improve your deck with various creatures and spells, collect powerful relics, and defeat your enemies to win the Card Toons game show!

name: Spellhack!!
description: Become a totally rad Spellhacker in "SPELLHACK!!" Collect Technospells, explore Doom City, and defend your portal against waves of Summoned Beasts in this video entertainment computer program!

name: Royal Decree!
description: Inspired by boardgames and roguelike deckbuilders, we crafted a unique single-player strategy card game. Craft your deck, resolve events and crises, enact royal decrees, all while fighting to stave off the collapse of your kingdom and legacy.

name: Re:Awaken
description: Purify negativity from the afterlife and bring together the children of fate! Swear oaths to divine beasts and wield powerful twilight abilities in this anime inspired roguelite adventure.

name: Novice Dungeon Master
description: [Novice Dungeon Master] is a dungeon management simulation set in a fantasy world of dungeons and adventures. Turn your beginner dungeon into the ultimate dungeon of your dreams. Greet adventurers who come to visit your dungeon, grow herbs, summon monsters, and more!

name: Hidden Clues: Gang Wars
description: New York is in need for daring detectives!

name: Moss Piglets
description: This real-time strategy game requires you to direct your horde of moss piglets through dynamic terrains and great dangers.

name: Citadel's Keeper
description: Protect your cities against waves of enemies. Manage your resources and plan accordingly to develop your city and armies to survive!

name: Beef Cat Ultra
description: Retro-aesthetic auto-shooter with tough handmade stages across several game styles. Choose from six total playable characters while collecting dozens of unique power-ups and rocking out to a chiptune-guitar fueled soundtrack.

name: Quadrillion
description: "Quadrillion" presents an immersive alternate-history experience set in the backdrop of a darkly reimagined First World War. This first-person game masterfully blends elements of dark fantasy with a unique retro aesthetic, offering players a captivating and eerie world to explore.

name: Exographer
description: Exographer is an exploration game based on science. Become an explorer, stranded in an alien planetoid, and discover the secrets of an extinct civilization. Gain new powers to avoid dangers and obstacles in your journey, and use your camera to reveal particles and hidden clues.

name: RPG non RPG: Valhalla
description: Dive into "RPG non RPG: Valhalla", an action RPG, adventure, and casual genre blend. Explore the mystical realms of Valhalla, uncovering secrets in ancient dungeons. Choose your class for unique abilities. Engage in strategic gameplay and immerse yourself in a Norse-inspired world.

name: Milfvania Ep. 1: Winter DLC
description: Save Christmas for the landlady and her daughters, and get rewarded by experiencing teenage love on a soviet roof.

name: Poon Puzzle: Hard Levels DLC
description: 18 more levels of increased difficulty for puzzle lovers

name: Happy Birthday
description: You will play as a simple and brave little girl, relax at your own pace, interact with the friendly people of Moon Valley, experience adventures through life and death, and finally return to the warmth of home for birthdays and Christmas!

name: Happy Birthday: The Horror of Christmas
description: Merry Christmas! Happy New Year! But this year Santa has a big problem! His old friend Deer ran away from home! What the hell is going on here? !

name: Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker - Master Character Training Pack: Sasori
description: A special training pack for your avatar! Get Sasori as a master in this Master Character Training Pack!

name: Shady Lewd Kart: Wild Woody Character Pack
description: Wild Woody joins Shady Lewd Kart!

name: SimRail: The Railway Simulator - Cargo Pack
description: Lead heavy freight trains with the legendary ET22 locomotive and new wagons. Conquer challenging missions and haul up to 3000 tons across Polish railways!

name: Backpack Monsters: Survivors
description: A PvP inventory management auto battler with evolution upgrades! Buy and update powerful monsters, then carefully arrange them in your grids.

name: Backpack Quest: Battles And Adventures
description: Manage your backpack inventory in this auto battler and achieve the best synergies. Three different game modes (pve and pvp), mid-fight activatable skills and environmental rules. Check your opponent's build and customize the roundly Drafting Shop and shift the odds in your favor!

name: Construction Simulator: Liebherr Pack
description: You cannot tackle a construction contract without using reliable machinery from the popular manufacturer Liebherr. Therefore, get the Liebherr Pack now and expand your fleet with six brand-new machines to be ready to face any challenge on the construction site!

name: Cooking Craze: Starter Pack
description: Jump start your new career in the Kitchen with the Starter Pack! This has everything you need to get ahead, including 150 spoons and 3 of every booster type!

name: Enlisted: Reinforced - Advanced Pack
description: This Pack includes: A premium squad consisting of 4 machine gunners and 1 engineer of level 4, armed with MG 13 machine gun;A premium Pz.Sfl. Ic tank;A premium squad consisting of 3 tankers of level 4.

name: Enlisted: Reinforced - Deluxe Pack
description: This Pack includes: A premium squad consisting of 4 machine gunners and 1 engineer of level 4, armed with Colt Monitor machine gun;A premium M8 A1 GMC tank;A premium squad consisting of 4 tankers of level 4;Unique portrait.

name: EZ2on Reboot: R - Hardcore Tano*C Music Pack vol.1
description: A collaboration pack from 'HARDCORE TANO*C', a famous hardcore music crew in the rhythm game scene, and EZ2ON REBOOT: R! Experience the ultimate joy in the deeper and more diverse hardcore music!

name: Flash Party: 2023 Hero Pack
description: Get all 4 heroes released in 2023! Heroes included: Cookie & Can, Foxx, Gwynn, and Crossover Hero - ICEY

name: FoolHut Pack: 3 games in 1
description: Play three* tiny BolHut games developed for April Fools! *There might be a fourth game inside.

name: Hexceed: Flavum Pack
description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Flavum Puzzle your way through 145 new levels - levels include all previously introduced mechanics!

name: House Flipper: Pop Art Furniture Pack
description: Behold the mind-bending creations from the most twisted imaginations! You'll discover items that defy convention and redefine the meaning of pop-art. Post-modern sofas, freaky chairs, and gripping dressers? We've got it all!

name: Pixel Puzzles Aardman Jigsaws
description:
Immerse yourself in a whimsical world of creativity with our latest digital jigsaw puzzle game, featuring the beloved characters from Aardman! Pixel Puzzles Aardman brings you iconic scenes from the lovable Wallace & Gromit to the hilarious Shaun the Sheep and much more. The game features 26 free puzzles with piece counts ranging from 96 to 425.

Dive into the enchanting world of Aardman, where every piece tells a story, and every puzzle piece placed brings you closer to the magic!

name: Pixel Puzzles Aardman Jigsaws: Shaun The Sheep
description: Pixel Puzzles Aardman, the definitive jigsaw puzzler for the PC platform.

name: Pixel Puzzles Aardman Jigsaws: The Farmers Llamas
description: Pixel Puzzles Aardman, the definitive jigsaw puzzler for the PC platform.

name: Pixel Puzzles Aardman Jigsaws: Variety Pack 1
description: Pixel Puzzles Aardman, the definitive jigsaw puzzler for the PC platform.

name: Pixel Puzzles Aardman Jigsaws: Wallace & Gromit - A Matter Of Loaf And Death
description: Pixel Puzzles Aardman, the definitive jigsaw puzzler for the PC platform.

name: Pixel Puzzles Aardman Jigsaws: Wallace & Gromit - Vacation
description: Pixel Puzzles Aardman, the definitive jigsaw puzzler for the PC platform.

name: Void Soul
description:
"Alright, we're going to rush to our target destination."

Endless revenge and twisted longing for family.
Steampunk fantasy of two emotions burning like fuse till the end begins now!

The story of an empire reigning over the desert continent and revel train confronting the empire.

name: Virtua Fighter Cool Champ
description: A card game based on the Virtua Fighter series for the Mobage platform.

name: Galaxy Burger
description: A cozy cooking simulator. Cook food for robo-kitties, aliens, and other strangers. Craft juicy burgers, fry fries, and make drinks! Play in co-op with friends ‍‍ or alone. Expand your space burger shop and travel the galaxy.

name: YiShi
description: A squad-based game where the player takes the role of a healer in a Whac-A-Mole attempt to keep the squad alive through healing, enchantment, and offensive spells to vanquish hordes of green skins.

name: Deck of Darkness: Infernal Depths
description: You are an artifact hunter, a seeker and purveyor of rare, magical relics. The ultimate goal of your search is the fabled Deck of Darkness, an incredibly potent arcane artifact said to grant it's bearer immortality... for a price. Journey into the Infernal Depths and face your terrifying destiny.

name: Metro Outbreak
description: In Subway Outbreak, defend and rebuild your metro station against mutant hordes in this pixel strategy game. Manage tasks like fortifying defenses, launching assaults, and gathering resources to survive 30 days of increasingly fierce attacks. Lose by death or generator destruction.

name: Primland The Magus
description: A dark fantasy 2D action game about a solitary island that has turned into hell and a girl named Magus. Collect "relics" sleeping on the island and acquire skills. Take on mysteries and powerful enemies using a variety of actions!

name: Sir Bucket
description: Sir Bucket is a choose-your-own-adventure game set in a fantasy world with over 30 different endings. Explore the world and have your story told by a wisecracking narrator.

name: MeteoStorm
description: MeteoStorm is an action packed retro shoot-em-up. MeteoStorm offers up to 25 challenging waves of exciting shoot-em-up action with 3 different difficulty levels!

name: Chuno
description: This is a game where Chuno, a mutated snail, goes on a journey and brings back souvenirs and stuffed animals. A very easy and short 2D action. Menu operations are performed using the mouse. Use only WASD or arrow keys. There is no failure or retry system.

name: Cars
description: Sin descripción

developers.name: Playables, Mario von Rickenbach, Michael Frei

name: Piece It!
description: A casual jigsaw puzzle experience! Listen to awesome background music and enjoy the relaxing view and sounds of nature at the end of each puzzle!

name: Chat Wars!
description: Chat Wars! is a real time strategy game playable only for a streamer with at least 30~40 viewers. Gather gold and upgrade chat viewer's Unit and spell for streamer! Collaborate with chat and streamers to win!

name: Ostera: The curse of...
description: Welcome to Ostera: The curse of... Your subjects are waiting for you to save your village from a looming curse.

name: OverRider
description: A beat'em up style action game, thrilling, hardcore. You can choose between exploring a cyberpunk city, takeover enemies' bodies; or perform a surgery for implants? You play as a female doctor with a mysterious past, hunting at night in Yayoi City and perform surgeries on day in her clinic.

name: Many Mini Typing Games
description: Chase high scores in a series of breakneck typing minigames! Keep up with keyboard-mashing cats, banana-wielding monkey-cowboys and more as you "QWERTY" your way to new heights!

name: Shy Girl's Makeover
description: College students Kenta and Ayaka are united in their love for video games – and in their feelings for each other. Will their relationship progress beyond being two close gaming friends or will Ayaka’s heart be charmed by someone else? Find out in this slice of life RPG set in modern Japan!

name: Chaotic Good Boy
description: Sin descripción

name: Escape Qinglong Mountain Re
description: You wake up suddenly and find yourself in a mental hospital, facing numerous severely mentally ill patients, with your life hanging by a thread. Can you escape from here?

name: 3AM Corp: The Balbazar Resort
description: Beware of Balbazar in this horror/psychological thriller adventure. Evade the enigmatic Balbazar, use your wits and homemade sleuth kit to capture proof that something ominous is happening, and make it out alive. Do not get caught. The cops aren't doing anything... perhaps there's a reason.

name: Firewall: Cyber Defense
description: A lore-based cyberspace tower-defense where you defend artificially intelligent Constructs from Corrupted bugs and viruses.

name: Trillenium
description: In the year 2999, art is on the brink of extinction by AI. Within 3 Days, unite the few remaining artists together to end AI's monopoly on society once and for all. Trillenium is a bite-sized 2D RPG created by artists, for artists, and reminds us that to lose art is to lose humanity itself.

name: SoundKilla
description: SoundKilla a game steeped in Caribbean Sound Clash culture. Succeed by collecting dubplates, mastering DJ skills and conquering formidable bosses. Set against a backdrop of cityscapes and tropical islands, this game offers a unique blend of music, strategy and storytelling from start to finish.

name: Chronocide
description: Stop the undead from entering the temporal portals with traps and your weapons. Play the campaign solo or in co-op mode up to 4 players.

name: Forget Something?
description: A thrilling and fast-paced indie horror game.

name: The Simulation
description: Welcome to the Simulation! A first person, physics simulation based puzzle game where you solve puzzles and answer riddles which will test your creativity and intelligence. Gain unique powers along the way. Each puzzle is different and there are multiple ways to solve them. Good Luck!

name: Presidents Tower Defense
description: Defend the Oval Office from an endless alien invasion by harnessing the abilities of your favorite (or least favorite) U.S. Presidents.

name: Mr. Scientist
description: Mr. Scientist is a single player horror game. You are a hostage of a mad scientist and now you need to escape from his house.

name: Paraplasm: Beyond the Veil
description: You fell into this cursed house! But will you be able to cope with the paranormal activity? Solve the puzzles and try to find your way out!

name: Twilight Epoch
description: A science-fantasy action-RPG, taking a party of characters on a story-rich journey through a universe in it's dying breath.

name: Commute
description: On your daily "commute" from work, you may sometimes encounter some situations. Please observe your surroundings carefully and get home safely!

name: Ashes
description: This horror game inspired by Chinese folklore offers an enthralling journey through the depths of the Underworld. As you delve deeper, you'll unravel hidden secrets veiled in the darkness.

name: Black & White Lite
description: "Black & White•plot exclusive version" is a dystopian visual novel game: black and white, sensibility and reason, freedom and order: follow your beliefs and join your camp.

name: Sticky Arrow
description: A Sokoban-like puzzle game, which can be solved using only the arrow keys.

name: LTA: Light-years! Thrusters! Action!
description: LTA: Light-years! Thrusters! Action! - A space roguelite game about adventures, loyal crews and a multitude of amazing stories in the depths of the galaxy. Sources of inspiration for this game: The sense of freedom and adventure from Pirates! by Sid Meier, crazy stories from Rimworld...

name: Zhuzi Subdues Demons
description: This is a CRPG game, you can operate a team of 5 people to explore together. Combat is real-time, but allows players to pause the game mid-game to give orders to their team members. The controls refer to Dragon Age origins and Dragon Age II. If you like Dragon Age, you can try to play this game

name: Xeno
description: Xeno is a 2D platform game - we move left and right and jump in the game, we can shoot and, in some cases, sneak to eliminate enemies from hiding. The game will also feature the use of the environment, such as exoskeletons or vehicles of all types, and puzzles.

name: Cordyceps Island
description: Survive against an infinite wave of the infected that seems to only grow faster & stronger.

name: Twenty-second: Stories of Underground Kharkiv
description: The Twenty-Second: Stories of Underground Kharkiv is a quest and a visual novel that will tell you in the first person about the events of 2022 in the Kharkiv metro.

name: Runa
description: An indie adventure inspired by JRPG classics, with turn-based battle system, social links and a story-rich science fantasy world.

name: Forty-Niner
description: Immerse yourself in a survival and exploration game set in a procedural Wild West world. Choose your role, and set out to prove your legend on the frontier by building, mining, and battling alone or with friends.

name: Incremental Town RPG
description: Incremental Town RPG is an idle game where you manage the workforce of a small village, inputs, capital, other resources and help provide all the equipment and weaponry needed to progress and defeat creatures in distant Dungeons.

name: Virus 3D
description: Eradicate the logic viruses infecting your android baby sister in order to save her life in this fast-paced twin-stick shooter.

name: Chordioid
description: Chordioid is a unique musical JRPG where you battle to the beat. Explore a strange world, make unlikely friends, and uncover dark secrets, all while the beat goes on.

name: Slo's Home
description: Forty seeks revenge by trying to get all the information possible to unmask the real Slo, paying him back in kind. Slo's Home is a game that combines the control of an action game with the control of a point'n click adventure.

name: Castle Conquest: Medieval Strategy
description: A simple strategy about capturing castles. Build up your forces, manage armies and capture enemy fortresses. Build buildings in castles and use strategic tricks. Capture all the fortresses to win.

name: Legacy of Epstein: Foul Dreamer
description: Following the events of his "Bad Omen", Juglio arrives in the fallen city of Gettysburg to search for his friend Lenny.

name: Little Army Manager
description: Build and customize your army to battle against waves of enemies. Strategize and use spells to outsmart your foes. Upgrade your units and power to ensure victory. Simple to play, yet full of depth and challenge.

name: Warrior Lords
description: Warrior Lords offers a furious medieval arcade experience, drawing inspiration from classic beat 'em ups. Battle through Western Europe wielding cold steel, delivering powerful kicks and summoning dragons. Choose from 6 unique heroes and defeat your rivals in a quest for supremacy.

name: Fusionsmith
description: Delve deep underground, fill your bags with precious metals and forge your way through in this action packed roguelike featuring unique spin on crafting your gear.

name: Death Pilot
description: Immerse yourself in the mind of a lone clone, created by an abandoned factory with an inexplicable mission: conquer a desolate planet. Uncover the mystery of your existence as you explore a world littered with the remains of failed clones, questioning your purpose and sanity.

name: Assasin Top Down
description: Assassin Top Down is an exciting game that puts you in the shoes of a skilled assassin on a mission to eliminate guards without being detected.

name: Astral Disorder
description: As the lone maintenance worker on an unkempt space train station, navigate the chaos unleashed by a catastrophic crash and evade a relentless beast. Armed with scattered tools and state-of-the-art equipment, outsmart your pursuer and secure passage to safety aboard a distant escape pod.

name: Code Name: Unstable
description: Engage in thrilling space battles against a variety of formidable bosses, each with unique abilities and strategies. With every victory, unlock powerful upgrades to enhance your ship's weapons, defenses, and special abilities.

name: Jetsam!
description: Jetsam! is an action-packed jetski racing game in which players compete in intense races across dynamic and visually stunning environments.

name: Baseball Legacy Manager 24
description: Build the ultimate legacy as the general manager of a professional baseball team!

name: Go Rollo Go
description: RIP, REPLACE, REARRANGE, ROTATE and ROLL on a vibrant high-velocity adventure to Craft the Ultimate Smoothie and Restore The Multiverse you Wrecked.

name: Monkey See, Monkey Doo, Monkey Kiss You
description: Monkey See, Monkey Doo, Monkey Kiss You is a gripping first-person horror adventure. Stranded in a sinister forest, evade amorous monkeys while navigating treacherous paths. Face chilling encounters, uncover mysteries, and fight for survival in this pulse-pounding tale of fear and tension.

name: Liminality
description: Liminality is a single-player exploration game focused on liminal spaces, but mainly the poolrooms. Dive into the eerie but relaxing lukewarm water of the poolrooms. Navigate through the liminal spaces, where reality blurs, and uncover the secrets that lie beneath the surface

name: Diary of a Stoner
description: Wander through the Stoner Universe and Duel with Magical Cards! Will you use your power for Good? Or Evil? Many different endings are available depending on the choices you make. You are about to embark on a wonderous stoned adventure!

name: Chef's Adventure
description: You are a chef on the hunt for chickens, which have what you need: Fresh eggs! (Demo does not include eggs). Find the chickens, gain new skills and explore the different levels of: Chef's Adventure

name: Cursed Dawn
description: Cursed Dawn is a wave survival FPS featuring complex maps packed with secrets, dynamic spawns, and hordes of zombies to turn into gory mulch. Plan your defense, stay on the move, and master the maps. Remember: Nowhere is safe, death is assured, how long can you last until you become zombie chow?.

name: Syuukun in Mirror World
description: The game is a short walking simulator that explores a 3D space. However, the controlling character is trapped in the Mirror World, and the player must control him from the real world to lead him to the goal.

name: SGS Battle For: Hue
description: The battle of Hué is an epic fight during the audacious 1968 Tết offensive launched by the Communists during the Vietnam War. Relive one of the longest, bloodiest battles the Americans would fight against VC in that emblematic conflict.

name: Mirage: A Biplane Adventure
description: Embark on a daring journey in Mirage. Master aerial combat, navigate treacherous skies, and unravel the mystery behind invading machines. Can you save the world?

name: Farm Together 2
description: Grow your own farm all by yourself, or cooperate with your friends in the long awaited sequel to the cozy, relaxing farming experience!

name: Echoes
description: Immerse yourself in a stunning sci-fi visual novel. In a fractured Federation on the brink, Captain Zara Kincaid is caught between political schemes and an enigmatic alien force. Your choices determine her path and the fate of worlds.

name: Eternal Strands
description: Fight epic, towering creatures while blending magical abilities with an arsenal of powerful weapons to keep the world from crumbling in this third-person, action-adventure game.

name: Vertical Fighters
description: Vertical Fighters is a top-down shooter with a tactical Rock-Paper-Scissors twist! Play as 4 unique classes that hard-counter each other, experiencing moments of exhilarating counter-play, fun cooperation and fiendish treachery. Customise your variants, camos and pilots for maximum skill expression!

name: Hydrogen Game
description: A falling puzzle game where you drop 118 different elements and aim for a high score. You don't have to know the elements! Can you see the 118th element?

name: Code: Sentinel
description: In this cyberpunk FPS, players navigate a dystopian city corrupted by a malevolent computer virus. You, armed with weapons and skills, unravels the secrets behind CyberCorp's experiments.

name: Item Collector Ball
description: You're a ball that collects items! Explore this carefully crafted time trial platformer with a plethora of unique physics based obstacles. Unique music and retro aesthetic define this game and provide a relaxing and satisfying experience. Easy to pick up but challenging to master.

name: Kill The Clock
description: Enter mid-1900s Europe on a quest for revenge, only to find your nemesis murdered. Framed for the crime, unravel the mystery with RPG elements, offering various choices to crack the case. With each playthrough, uncover new killers and methods. Can you clear your name before it's too late?

name: To Build a Home
description: To Build a Home is a 2D life simulation game. Inspired in equal parts in The Sims and Dwarf Fortress, the simplified graphics hide a complex AI and deep interactions between characters and objects, the perfect environment for rich emergent behaviour.

name: Bird Year
description: Bird Year is a gentle, family-friendly arcade game where you're a bird. Feed your hungry babies and avoid the dangers of the forest all year long. Catch bugs, eat berries and dodge predators while using your chosen bird's unique abilities. Unlock bonus content including more birds and a bonus level!

name: Dead Season
description: Guide a group of unprepared strangers in their struggle to survive a zombie apocalypse, in Dead Season, a turn-based tactics game. Strategize to endure against relentless undead hordes, but beware, noise attracts more danger. Can you escape the outbreak's grip?

name: Lands of Koastalia
description: Lands of Koastalia is a relaxing city building game with a unique building system. As Mayor, your primary mission is to keep people happy. Craft natural-looking villages, manage resources within and across them, explore an island, and meet the needs of your residents.

name: Diamond Drone
description: Put your drone piloting skills to the test in Diamond Drone! Race against the clock to collect all the rubies while keeping an eye on your battery level. Don't forget to search for batteries on the floor to recharge. How skilled are you at maneuvering drones?

name: Unscripted Fate
description: The protagonist is Alex, who comes from a poor family and by this reason, from an innocent child ends up being part of a criminal organization from a young age.

name: Idle Meteor
description: Cycle through phases of extinction, expansion, and exploration in an idle game where you play as a god who wants to establish a civilization in a hostile world where meteors fall almost as often as rain.

name: Pinball Storm: Lokanta
description: Pinball Storm:Lokanta is a RPG game combing Roguelike and pinball gameplay. You will be part of the resistance against plutocracy. Use your marble pinball to eliminate waves of enemies, and collect resources to further enhance your pinball. Save the world from hell!

name: MrHuh
description: Fight zombies.

name: On the Bubble
description: Inspired by classic platforming games, On the Bubble is an action-packed 3D platforming experience for fans of fast-paced games. The level editor allows anyone to make their own creations to be completed at breakneck speeds.

name: Teo Dove Pro Skater 2
description: Skateboarding game in the spirit of THPS. Perform flip tricks, grabs, grinds. Insane lines. Level up your character and learn new tricks. Find hidden secrets. And challenge your rival to a classic game of skate HORSE!

name: Dirge For The Zone
description: Dirge For the Zone/D4Z is a top-down shooter with role-playing and base-building elements. Build your base, protect your people and send them to explore the Zone.

name: Football Manager Lifestyle 24
description: Can you balance football management and life simulation? Football Manager Lifestyle 24 uniquely blends both, Guide your club to glory and pursue personal ventures to become a lifestyle icon. Grow your club, manage fishing and farming businesses, make friends, and win trophies in this dynamic world.

name: Baseline
description: BALLERS ELITE combines nostalgia with modern technology. The gameplay is like Rocket League & NBA Street both went in on a test tube baby!

name: Skuf Backrooms
description: Have you ever wondered what might be waiting for you when you once again leave the confines of your apartment? And you obviously didn't realize that an ordinary walk to the garbage chute could turn into your nightmare.

name: Traitor's Gambit
description: "Traitor's Gambit" is a gripping multiplayer shooter filled with deception and suspense. Players take on roles like Innocents, Detectives, or Traitors, navigating diverse maps. With unique roles, expansive maps, and thrilling rounds, each game promises an unpredictable and dynamic experience.

name: Escape From Zombietown
description: Escape From Zombietown is an Action Shooter FPS where you collect guns, grenades and consumables to help you fight off the zombies while you make your way out of town. With 20 levels filled to the brim with zombies, this game has all the zombie annihilating action you need.

name: Machorium: Muscle Aquarium Simulator
description: Machorium - Muscle Aquarium Simulator - is a relaxing idle and sandbox game where you can unwind and have fun. Use points generated by cute little decorative muscle men to unlock various items and create your ideal muscle aquarium, Machorium.

name: The Real Faces of Vtuber
description: In this murder committed in a VTuber agency, the identity of the Nakanohito is key to cracking the case.

name: Shush
description: You are one of the "Waste Warriors", navigating hazardous forests to gather trash for the Eco-Collector. Collect resources, build a base, evade enemies, and uncover the dark secret hidden within the Eco-Collector to survive.

name: Programming Factory
description: What kind of sparks will programming and factories create? Watching strings and numbers run on the conveyor belt, enjoy leisure time!!!

name: Escape the Kreegan
description: Escape corruption and deliver truth to the people in the only way you know how. as a space fighter pilot! You steal a ship and flee, it falls to you to duke it out in space and deliver truth to the people. Restore peace. Restore justice. Save humanity and Escape The Kreegan!

name: Don't Let It Die
description: As the first tribe to discover fire, master its creation amidst prehistoric survival challenges. Synergize 17+ unique characters, items, and strategize to ignite your legacy and secure humanity's dawn. A solo quest for fire's mastery awaits those with the will to not only survive, but thrive.

name: Sipssassin
description: You are the Sipssassin and your mission is to drink every drink in sight by whatever means necessary. Run, fight, sneak and drink through unique levels. Unlock new characters and find hidden secrets. Just make sure you don't get caught!

name: The Destiny Of Nagari
description: Embark on an epic adventure to become the greatest magician ever! Master the elements - water, fire, air, and earth. Explore magical worlds and use the diary of the last magician king to protect your kingdom from monsters. Are you ready to unleash your powers and save your realm?

name: Egg Defense
description: 'Egg Defense' is a strategy game where players deploy units to defend against enemy eggs from portals. Units have unique skills. Every 5 stages, players upgrade character skills using selected cards. The game blends casual strategy with enjoyable action for a delightful gaming experience.

name: Steel Symphony
description: Steel Symphony is a 2D Action-Strategy platformer where players craft combat sentinels by selecting components and balancing stats like integrity, mobility, and weapon capabilities. Chassis, weapons, and modules shape each sentinel's role with varied abilities for strategic customization.

name: Coffee For Cthulhu
description: Coffee For Cthulhu is a Lovecraftian Comfy Coffee Shop Simulator. During the day, you serve customers, brew coffee, and keep the various coffee machines from exploding or attacking customers. During the Night you hunt for ingredients in the dark woods where the feral monsters lay in wait.

name: Buzz or Die
description: If you win, you are acquitted; if you lose, you are executed. Death row inmates compete for ratings and talk battle in the conversation deck!

name: Milfvania Ep. 1
description: An animated adult visual novel, set up in a post-soviet environment. Yes, you live with the landlady.

name: Milfvania Ep. 2
description: A post soviet 3D milf adventure! Get acquainted with landlady's older daughter.

name: Terra
description: Terra is an atmospheric real-time strategy game that combines 4X elements with a procedural universe. Wage war, engage in diplomacy, and discover hidden characters and the mysteries of the universe through the eyes of one of 5 unique factions.

name: Monster Island
description: An adventure game styled as a roguelike pet training game. Here, you can tame over 130 unique monster pets, unlock their exclusive skills, and assist you in your adventure. Constantly challenge yourself, unlock more exciting content, and explore this world filled with fantasy and adventure.

name: 1995Card+
description: Sin descripción

name: Duckside
description: Imagine DayZ or Rust but you're a duck. A persistent world survival game with PVP, PVE, crafting, base building and hat wearing ducks, wielding weapons.

name: Xin Shen Diao Xia Lu Zhi Wanjie Pian
description:
Xin Shen Diao Xia Lu Zhi Wanjie Pian is the second installment in the series based on Louis Cha's (better known by his pen name Jin Yong) The Return of the Condor Heroes. Players will control Yang Guo who finds out that his lover Xiaolongnü is still alive after 16 years and sets out to find her.

The game plays like an RPG. Players move Yang Guo using the mouse and battles use a turn-based system where each character out of a party of up to 3 characters can attack as soon as their meter is full.

name: A Turnabout to El Dorado
description:
Taking place several months after the events of Spirit of Justice, Phoenix finds himself alone when he takes a rather strange -- and extremely hopeless case. With an uncooperative defendant, a staggering amount of evidence supporting the police's case, and a prosecutor that clearly has it in for him, how will Phoenix turn things around? Is there even any room for doubt?

Where does the truth lie?

In the hearts of the key players, all with their own secrets and motives?

Between the trees of the dense forest, the scene of a horrific murder?

Or perhaps, in the mythical city of gold that seems to be the connecting factor between the strange circumstances of the case -- El Dorado?

name: Eclipse
description:
﻿"His partner told him to shoot the criminal, so he picked up the gun and took a shot... ...even though that event has passed, the echo of a gunshot still resounds in his mind."

After having a bad dream of a hostage incident, Officer Kelvin Bishop awakens to a dark morning. The past still haunts him, but even so he has to get ready for work like every other day.
At the same time, but in a different place. Andrea Frost, an ordinary high school girl brings her friend to the hospital with her sister.

Suddenly there is an eclipse, and everything starts to go wrong. While she is struggling to get back home, Kelvin is struggling to get to the police station. A grieving man and an innocent girl are now trapped in the same situation.

Can this be just coincidence,
or is something more...? Something extraordinary.

name: Eighteen
description:
You awaken in a house that is not yours. You are haunted by a past that you hope is not yours. You are given a name that you fear can never truly be yours.

You are Tohya Hachijo.

...Or are you?

In this short interactive experience, take control of an amnesiac looking to find his footing in the home of a strange woman, as he discovers his past -- or runs from it.

name: A Journey to Omega Station
description:
The year is 2044. A secret branch of the government known only as 'The Agency' has discovered rifts -- codenamed 'Breaches' -- to an alternate dimension. The ones tasked with exploring said unknown areas are known as 'The Divers.'

This strange new domain hides many secrets. Perhaps the most crucial one being what has been named as 'The Station.'

As a Diver, you are tasked to travel to the Station in the Omega Breach and use its abilities to bring a missing woman home.

The journey is difficult and possibly perilous. Battle this bizarre universe's environment and your own insecurities to reach your destination and go back home yourself.

name: The Firebrand
description:
"The pain's always the same."

An interrogation room. Sitting on one side of a table is a woman. On the other is you - a detective tired of asking questions, but desperate for answers.

Who is the woman? Why is she here? What has she done?

The only way to find out is to talk. Every conversation topic giving new leads to chase down. Some worthwhile. Others not so much.

Follow the rabbit hole until you reach the truth.

name: The Vault
description: The task is, at its core, simple. All you have to do is leave this vault. Any means will do. Provided you abide by certain... conditions.

name: The Tree Of Life
description:
In the near future, a peculiar type of coffin is invented. One that takes the genetic material of the corpse within it to produce a special tree. It doesn't take long for cemeteries to no longer be barren. In fact, traditional tombstones end up being abandoned altogether. Why wouldn't they?

The person's memory is preserved -- and reflected -- in what comes out of the ground. It's all you need.

A man visits such a grave -- one belonging to his brother. It's not reminiscing that brings him there. The local priest had filed a complaint in an effort to chop the tree down due to its... abnormal nature.

A dead tree.

That -- somehow -- still grows

name: Didnapper
description:
Didnapper is a non-profit fan RPG Maker game originally developed by Wychkith for the ADIDAS Message Boards as a fun little curiosity before it became a full game after developer Kendrian became lead developer in 2012.

The story revolves around a princess from a unnamed fantasy kingdom named Suki who, after being betrayed by her cousin Cherisa who wanted to inherit the throne instead of her, is given the choice to join the Kidnapping Guild that held her captive in exchange of not being bound and gagged in a cell and to discover why Cherisa betrayed her.

As a kidnapper, she is tasked to kidnap girls for ransom while her guild searches for information on her cousin's whereabouts.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Vegas Collection
description: A collection of both Rainbow Six Vegas & Rainbow Six Vegas 2. Rainbow operatives take to the chaotic streets of Las Vegas as an escalating terrorist siege in 'Sin City' threatens to take world terrorism to new, uncontrollable heights in Rainbow Six Vegas. In Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Vegas 2, it is your last chance to rescue America's sexiest city from an escalating terrorist siege that will force you into heart-pounding action from beginning to end. The best are back and this time winner takes all.

name: PokéRogue
description: A Pokémon fangame heavily inspired by the roguelite genre. Battle endlessly while gathering stacking items, exploring many different biomes, and reaching Pokémon stats you never thought possible.

name: Exoprimal: Season 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Exoprimal: Season 4
description:
The third Capcom Collab is slated to release its set of collaborative content with Mega Man alongside Title Update 4.
It'll include suit skins, decals, charms, stamps, and emotes based on the beloved Mega Man franchise!

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops II - Nuketown Zombies
description:
Nuketown Zombies, also known as Nuketown in-game, is a Zombies map that is featured in Call of Duty: Black Ops II. It is based on Nuketown, a multiplayer map from Call of Duty: Black Ops and Call of Duty: Black Ops II.

The map was previously only available to players who purchased the Hardened, Care Package, or Digital Deluxe editions but was later made available to purchase in the system's digital marketplace.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops II - Nuketown 2025
description:
Nuketown 2025 is a downloadable map released for Call of Duty: Black Ops II. It is a remake of Nuketown which first appeared in Call of Duty: Black Ops. While the original Nuketown went for more of a traditional 1950s theme, the new map is now in a 1960s retro-futuristic Mid-Century modern style meant to represent the "Home of the Future" for 2025.

It was available for free to anyone who pre-ordered the game, purchased a launch copy, or purchased the Hardened edition or the "Care Package" limited special edition of the game. It was later made available to download for free to everyone as well as being included in an update for Call of Duty: Black Ops II on Wii U.

name: Garden City Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Luminastadt
description: It's a cosy colony simulation game. Build and expand your colony by designing buildings, roads and infrastructure. Manage resources such as food, water and building materials. Manage housing, healthcare and education to keep your population happy and productive.

name: Catarsis: Catventure
description: Step into an exciting journey in Catarsis, a rogue-like action game where you are the last hope for the world. In this outlaw-like action game, surviving enemy attacks in each room will require careful choices of upgrading your character's abilities and the features of the weapons in your inventory.

name: Box To The Beat VR: Indie Electro Beats
description: Introducing the "Indie Electro Beats" DLC for BOX to the BEAT! Enjoy 10 unique tracks crafted by two up and coming artists! Feel the intensity as you sync your punches with the beats made by these talented creators. Step into the ring and prepare to be challenged as you take on these intense levels!

name: Car Wash
description: The ultimate cars game for kids and preschool children. Featuring a lot of different cars and vehicles and lots of tools to choose from for cleaning cars and even make cars dirty again. A perfect family friendly game for all children, kids, toddlers. Very cute car wash!

name: Infinicity
description: This little sandbox game generates gigabytes of procedural city, traffic and world around you as you move.

name: Funny Farm Learning Games for Toddlers and Kids
description: Does your child like farm animals, farm life, animated puzzles and want to learn their first colors, shapes and sizes? Then get your child our new Farm Games educational game, which includes different animated levels and a ton of fun.

name: Legends of Dragaea: Idle Dungeons
description: Legends of Dragaea: Idle Dungeons is a First Person Idle Dungeon Crawler game with 6 unique races to choose, robust combat, a grand saga spanning a continent full of unique kingdoms, free-form skill system, and a guild management system to master as you uncover the secrets of the world of Dragaea!

name: Animal Farm Jigsaw Games for Toddlers, Babys and Kids
description: The ultimate farm children's game with lots of animal puzzles and farm motifs. The perfect learning game for all children, toddlers, babies, jigsaw puzzle and animal lovers. Familyfriendly!

name: Trouble Comes Twice: Bonus Stories
description: An optional DLC that adds additional post-story moments to Trouble Comes Twice! Enjoy various short stories starring the twins and their love interests.

name: Time Avarice
description: Time is your currency and challenge. Destroy crystals for time; lose it if they vanish. Every run offers new power-ups, with choices that shape your journey. Unlock more as you play, all set in a visually dynamic, arcade-inspired space roguelite.

name: Save the Frog Keita
description: This game is to help the frog Kata and his friends escape from a dangerous area.

name: Escape Blocks
description: A space themed puzzle game.

name: Escape
description: A sports zombie fighting game that uses props from different scenes to fight against zombies, completing various level tasks and opening the next level. Each level has different gameplay

name: Brave Hero
description: This is a classic shooting game!

name: Cosmic Kitchen
description: Cosmic Kitchen is a 2D cooking game set in space! Your mission: Feed hungry monsters or else they will take over all the galaxies! Think fast and grab food as it flies into orbit. Use planets, asteroids and more to get cooking and save the universe!

name: Destination Paradise

description: DopeNet is a fantasy dark web drug dealing simulator. Buy low, sell high, stay free.

name: Guerra de Insetos TW Premium
description: play, win insects and use multiple insects to beat your opponent

name: Chains of Judgment
description: Homicide detective, Ralph, is distraught when his trusted, reliable partner and best friend go missing around the same time when strange killings begin to appear. While solving the case, Ralph is paired up with an impish rookie who he can't get along with.

name: Midori no Kaori
description: Welcome to Midori no Kaori, a relaxing cozy game that allows you to create your own Japanese shop and manage customers. There are no winners or losers here, just unleash your creativity and enjoy a unique experience.

name: SGS Overlord
description: The largest amphibious operation of WW2, and a two-month campaign in the hell of the Norman bocage. Will you manage to make the decisive breakthrough before the Germans recover? Or will you succeed, as Rommel wanted, in crushing the Allied landing as close to the beaches as possible?

name: House of 1000 Traps
description: While carrying out your usual heist, you end up locked in a house filled to the roof with traps with a serial killer ready to stab you in the neck with his butcher knife. Be stealthy and get what you came here for, and find a way out!

name: Witchmarsh: Tea Party of the Damned
description: Create and lead a team of four investigators in this action RPG set in Jazz Age New England.

name: Azure '88
description: Azure '88 is a fast-paced 2D platformer game with a roller-skating-based movement system. Explore the economically and socially broken Earth in the year 2088, where our main protagonist desperately wants to escape by getting into a space shuttle to prosperous Mars that leaves once a decade.

name: Color Splash: Rodents
description: Color Splash: Rodents is a charming and relaxing puzzle game that will lift your spirits and take You into the world of adorable rodents and art. Venture into the gallery, where you will find many extraordinary and colorful rodent paintings.

name: Dead Fibers
description: A deadly virus has transformed the majority of the global population into relentless, ravenous zombie-like monsters called "Fibers", leaving only a scattered few survivors clinging to hope in isolated pockets of civilization.

name: The Ape Tales: An Epic Adventure Game
description: Experience an epic 2D adventure game by becoming the legendary ape who is the last hope for innocent animals. Traverse through diverse realms and eras, encountering evil that threatens your species. Prepare for the unexpected as each location unveils unique enemies and challenges that you will face.

name: PuzzSinker
description: A Puyo-Puyo adjacent HellSinker fan-game.

name: Tobarinker
description: Rare off-shoot of Ruminant Whimper's "Hellsinker" (which is a spiritual sequel to "Radio Zonde") like D.N.A. Software's "Shaftdiver", this is a simple single-screen action game with the goal of protecting allies and defeating bosses. It had a very small production run released back in 2010 as Trickster Jam's first game project, the creator disappeared shortly afterwards.

name: Sister Location 8-bit
description: An 8-bit game with 3 robot animatronics based in sister location.

name: Shatter Remastered
description: Shatter Remastered is a retro-inspired brick-breaking game that combines classic action with unique twists and incredible boss battles. This mobile version requires a Netflix subscription to play.

name: PC Simulator
description: Buy components and assemble your computer!

name: Aftertaste
description:
Aftertaste was written for NaNoRenO 2024. Currently, only part of the story has been released; further updates will come shortly until the story is fully complete. Please note that some story parts, artwork, and other assets in this current iteration may change in the future, and it does not reflect the final game.

Warning: Aftertaste contains mature themes which are not suitable for all audiences, which may be distressing to certain readers. Player discretion is advised.

name: Touch Egg
description:
Will you survive the full time? Or will you become All Thumbs?

Finally, the revolutionary and culturally important egg experience comes to Playdate. 60 seconds on the clock, turn that crank and touch that egg! Watch your fingers and don’t let Him see you, his vision is based on movement!

name: Magic Farm: Ultimate Flower
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Aleste
description: Super Aleste (スーパーアレスタ, Sūpā Aresuta), is a vertically scrolling shooter developed by Compile. It was published by Toho in 1992 for the Super Famicom as part of the Aleste series. The player pilots a spacecraft through a variety of locales shooting enemy ships.

name: Macabre Ring 2: Mysterious Puppeteer
description: The Macabre Ring case has been reopened, this time with a menacing twist. Can you solve the mystery?

name: Magic Cards Solitaire
description: Sin descripción

name: Magica Travel Agency: Las Vegas
description: Sin descripción

name: Deluxe Flame Party Pack
description: A collection of Twitch based games that streamers can play with their chat live on Twitch. The chat plays by typing in chat.

name: Shuihu Zhuan Zhi Qunmo Fengyun Lu
description: A port of Chuanpu's Mega Drive strategy RPG "Shui Hu Zhuan"

name: Space Odyssey
description: Players play as cute food astronauts in a co-op party game. Different ship's roles like pilot, gunner, shielder, and gatherer. 'Dark Hotpot,' a new team from the 'Space Academy,' faces a colossal jellyfish alien devouring their planet. They must defeat it and say their plant.

name: Project 37
description: Project 37 is a multi-front, combat-focused RTS with a unique lane-based control scheme. Units move with more autonomy, but you'll have to fight on multiple parts of the map simultaneously. Crush your enemy with commando raids, mine fields, vehicle-crushing tanks, hacked defenses, and teleporters.

name: Monument Builders: Golden Gate Bridge
description: Sin descripción

name: Monument Builders: Titanic
description: Sin descripción

name: 31st March, Midnight.
description: 31st March, Midnight. is a short and free visual novel about a game developer who is working on a new spinoff for an up-and-coming studio.

name: Tail Concerto Battle
description: Tail Concerto Battle is a fan-made fighting game based on CyberConnect2's Tail Concerto, made in the 2D Fighting Maker 2nd. engine. The game features prominent characters from Tail Concerto, alongside guest characters Klonoa and Ran-oh.

name: Rainbow Mosaics: Strange Thing
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Glow
description: GLOW is an addictive physics-based arcade game that will challenge you to your limits. Push, dodge, and trick enemies while collecting points as the difficulty increases.

name: The Elder Gods
description: "The Elder Gods" is a dark card-based adventure inspired by the works of H.P. Lovecraft. It's an roguelike deckbuilder with a unique sanity-mechanic.

name: The Beast in the Shadows
description: Experience the heart-pounding suspense of a modern-day werewolf horror story as you step into the shoes of Cassie, a brave woman determined to put an end to a terrifying curse plaguing her small town.

name: Spectral Synergy
description: Embark on a dual-realm RPG odyssey in "Spectral Synergy" Master blade and magic, solve puzzles, and unravel a tale of balance between light and dark. Every choice alters your path in this 3D action roguelike adventure.

name: Ski Game
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Tappy Tilt
description: Sin descripción

name: Rainbow Mosaics: The Forest's Guardian
description: Sin descripción

name: Alien Invasion
description: The goal of the game is to blast the alien forces and get the highest score possible with your three lives. The tougher the enemy is to destroy, the greater the chance they will drop a valuable power-up.

name: Lots of Things: Collector's Edition
description: Explore a variety of locations, from a farm to a pastry shop to a medieval castle! Serach loads of hidden objects and complete the levels in the new "Layers" mode. Complete the tasks in the order you prefer, starting with mini-games or searching for objects!

name: Nibansen Plus
description:
If something unusual happens, go back to the opposite passage!
Find the rules from the repeating subway and escape!

name: Escape Room Super Bundle
description:
Five escape room adventures for you to puzzle through!
Art Heist, Sotano, Vereda, Alumni and Subnet.

name: Bungee Run
description: Can you survive the bungee run?

name: Devil's Calling
description: Lift the curse. Get revenge on The Bad Man.

name: Super Destronaut: Landed X Loaded
description:
How long can you survive in this hostile robot arena?

Battle for as long as possible in 10 different arenas, each with its own unique set of challenges. Shoot down enemy combatants, and gain special power-up drones that add extra firepower to your side. How long can you survive?

name: Football Cup 2024
description: Harness your football skills and lead your team to international glory! Lace-up your boots and get ready to hit the field like never before!

name: Spellarium 5
description: This Spellarium introduces several changes to the Match3 game mechanics, one of which is the Toggle Button. Also it includes some skippable bonus games such as Solitaire, Mahjong, Spot the Difference, and Hidden Objects. Of course, there's also a story to follow and a town to build!

name: Forza Motorsport: 1986 Lotus #12 Team Lotus 98T
description: Forza Motorsport 1986 Lotus #12 Team Lotus 98T

description: Forza Motorsport 2020 Lexus #14 VASSER SULLIVAN RC F GT3

description: Forza Motorsport 2019 Toyota 86 TRD SE

description: Forza Motorsport 1983 Nissan #23 Nissan Motorsports Silvia Super Silhouette

description: Forza Motorsport 2020 Audi TT RS Coupe
